_sText:
Always wondering why deathruns are so long and hard? This one is quite different. It has 6 unique traps.

**Version 2013 improvements:**

-Spikes trap replaced by falling concrete (fixed crash bug)

-Round end implemented - after elapsed time Ts will win

-Guns now have more ammo

-Fixed 2nd trap bug which was leading to kill CT on touch

-Added 4 colored lights

-Minor visual improvements

**Changes in 1.1:**

-Fixed acid trap's appearance

-Changed concrete trap's sound to make it louder

**Changes in 1.2:**

-Fixed acid trap (activated footbridge pushes player to acid pool no matter what)
